messages.message: do we have an endpoint for downloading an exported CSV?
I used `/api/v1/flow/results/export_to_csv` to generated the CSV after my job had finished, and then wanted to download the csv but couldn’t find a documented way to do that.
There should be a generic downloadFile endpoint somewhere
I’ll look on my work computer today. I was trying to re-use the way that AIHub downloads files and kept getting a login redirect.
How are you sending the download request? The request in AI Hub will have an auth cookie attached to it, so if you’re calling the API from your computer, you may need to provide an OAuth token
I’m using a token, but I haven’t been able to look at our code base yet of how I can download things. I’m mainly just exploring using the API to run files.

Here's the helper Serena wrote for AI Hub: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/427c48c5de09ab935ccebefaf15a37c41f423b[…]red/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/store/appResults/helpers.ts (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/427c48c5de09ab935ccebefaf15a37c41f423bde/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/store/appResults/helpers.ts#L212)
yeah I needed a cookie to do it this way. I’m running this call through Node and I can inherit cookies from my browser.
